description:
Conner is a hot little stud we met on a college campus in a small town. Prior to our discovering him, he had actually explored the idea of doing porn but hadn't yet done it. Apparently his friends know he is an exhibitionist and had sent his pictures into several other studios. Fortunately, he felt comfortable with us and came out for a shoot.
Conner says that he likes both boys and girls. Like me, he comes from a very conservative family — but he isn't at all shy when it comes to showing off his lean, smooth, muscular body.
After the shoot we took him out to a local bar for a little fun. All evening he was constantly being hit on, and at one point he was even approached by someone from another adult video company! Hey, when you're young and cute...
title: Conner
